mapper.select: insert into prdt_order( order_prdt_name, order_prdt_price, order_buy_time, order_pay_msg, order_pay_option, order_pay_email, order_device, order_prdt_quantity , order_prdt_option_name, order_prdt_price_arr , order_prdt_thumbnail, order_name, order_phone, order_phone_add, order_email, order_recipient, order_addr, order_recipient_phone, order_recipient_phone_add, order_delivery_message, order_delivery_message_add , order_state) values('${order_prdt_name}', '${order_prdt_price}', '${order_buy_time}', '${order_pay_msg}', '${order_pay_option}', '${order_pay_email}', '${order_device}', '${order_prdt_quantity}', '${order_prdt_option_name}', '${order_prdt_price_arr}', '${order_prdt_thumbnail}' , '${order_name}' , '${order_phone}' , '${order_phone_add}', '${order_email}', '${order_recipient}', '${order_addr}', '${order_recipient_phone}', '${order_recipient_phone_add}', '${order_delivery_message}', '${order_delivery_message_add}', '${order_state}' )
